Literature.Title: Small lipopeptides possess anti-biofilm capability comparable to daptomycin and vancomycin.
Literature.Author: Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Wang G

Literature.Title: Cationic Net Charge and Counter Ion Type as Antimicrobial Activity Determinant Factors of Short Lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Greber KE, Dawgul M, Kamysz W, Sawicki W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>200µM),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=100µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=2000µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis PCM 2118(MIC=64µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=512µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2000µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=2000µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=2000µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris PCM 2668(MIC=>2000µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=1000µg/ml),Candida tropicalis PCM 2681(MIC=1000µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 16404(MIC=2000µg/ml)
